title: Make a "troll" queue
body:
I never play this game sober. I like to fuck around on Teemo and spam memes in the chat.

When I play with other people who do the same stuff, nobody gets mad. The game is fun. Sometimes I get paired with people who take this game seriously. Like life-or-death seriously. Delusional bronze 3 players who think they're on the road to being the next Faker, mostly. When that happens, nobody has fun. 

I'm not having fun getting raged at by Faker Jr, or watching him ask the enemy team to report me because I died a few times in a videogame. Faker Jr isn't having any fun with a guy went support Teemo, is joking about Harambe in the all chat and doesn't particularly care if he gets killed.

Neither of us is wrong. Both of us are paying customers. Both of us are just trying to enjoy the game in the way that's the most fun to each of us. Neither of us should be punished but more importantly, neither of us should ever cross paths. People who want to be serious should be paired with other people who want to be serious. People who want to show up intoxicated and play in the troll funhouse should be paired with other players who like playing in the troll funhouse.

It's a win for players, and a win for Riot.

replies.body:
Interesting idea! :]  Here are two of my initial thoughts~~

How do you feel about the rotating game modes on weekends? Do those feel like you can be a bit more Teemo-y and spammy without having to deal with Faker Jrs?

Have you thought about custom games? At Riot, we play silly games all the time... like 'protect the Soraka' [5v5, each team has 4 players and a beginner bot Soraka; team with most Soraka kills wins], or 'hide the pink ward' [5v5, each player buys nothing but a pink ward and places within first couple min, win by destroying all 5 of the opposing team's wards], etc... there's really no limit to what kinna crazy stuff you can make up in customs!

I love playing silly custom games as well! My favorite has got to be hide and seek. To play, all you need to do is start a lobby on the Crystal Scar map and-

...wait a second.
Dude, you've just opened huge wound in my heart. :( I WANT MY HNS........ {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
That was pretty much all I played for ~3-6 months.  I still miss it.

Only problem is that you can almost never find 9 friends all willing to play a trolly-custom game with you at any hour. Also, if you create a public custom, 98% of the time, people either dc because they don't care about customs (which wouldn't matter, except when it's a 5v3, it gets to the point where it still isn't fun for anyone), or your time trying to find the other 9 trolls to play with is like >40 mins. 

It's great at Riot, since you guys all work together and can just yell to your buddy's desk that you want to play, but I can almost never find friends to play this kind of thing with me.

Usually if my friends are all down, we use ranked 5's and just spam off-meta picks and have stack races (mejais, veigar, nasus, etc...). Not a great place for it, but the other teams usually appreciate the free win, and we enjoy ourselves.

You could always make a troll club.  Its pretty easy to find 20+ people with similar interests for a club.  And you don't necessarily need to do a 5v5.  If you only have 6 players you could do a 3v3 custom.

> [{quoted}](name=Randomonium,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5oXZOYh8,comment-id=000500020000,timestamp=2016-08-31T19:50:22.961+0000)
>
> You could always make a troll club.  Its pretty easy to find 20+ people with similar interests for a club.  And you don't necessarily need to do a 5v5.  If you only have 6 players you could do a 3v3 custom.

Haha that's a pretty awesome idea.

You can also post on these Boards and I'm sure you'll find folks interested! I'm definitely down for silly fun custom games ^^
If only I knew how clubs work X_X
omg those games sound amazing. Wish enough of my friends still played this game to do 5v5 fun custom games :(

> [{quoted}](name=Dukues,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5oXZOYh8,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2016-08-31T18:10:51.368+0000)
>
> omg those games sound amazing. Wish enough of my friends still played this game to do 5v5 fun custom games :(

You can always do custom 2v2 or 3v3 or throw in some bots!
Ok i normaly don't play silly game like those but they look like **SO MUCH FUN** with a couple of friends, do you have any other crazy custom game you guys like to play?

> [{quoted}](name=Feerix,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5oXZOYh8,comment-id=00050013,timestamp=2016-09-01T00:48:01.531+0000)
>
> Ok i normaly don't play silly game like those but they look like **SO MUCH FUN** with a couple of friends, do you have any other crazy custom game you guys like to play?

Another great one is 'Catch the Teemo'... 5v5, each team has a Teemo; they are only allowed to buy movement-enhancing items and aren't allowed to stealth [must always be on the move].

I can't think of any more right now, feel free to share some of your own you come up with or try :]  Honestly, you can make up so many countless custom games!
I feel sorry for the Teemo that has to run from Kled.

You do realize he is playing Ranked and doing this right? 
Literally he is trolling in Ranked being drunk as he stated and ruining the game for that Faker Jr.

You guys stated Ranked Queues is more competitive play style but not LCS level still has similarities to what LCS has; communication but nobody does it, team game, seriousness, etcs.

Yet he is allowed to play and you're promoting him? Yeah Custom games are great to advise him but he literally in all his game history is playing how he wants, _yes nothing wrong_ but he literally trolls in Ranked... It'd be a different story and more reasonable for him to play how he wants in Normal games, ARAM and even if he  takes it to Custom games which he doesn't...

So why is he getting all these upvotes for? Yeah the idea sounds nice and amazing to 99% of the community apparently BUT that doesn't unjust what he literally did, 'troll in ranked' and believes he is innocent because he wants to get away with murder... in this case a poor Faker Jr. lost a game in Ranked because someone wants to play for fun and screw about.

Anyone in their right mind would be frustrated and upset because they've just wasted 30 or so minutes to find out they will only lose and lose because of someone goofing off.

Even if players admit to playing Ranked not as serious for those who WANT to climb and play it competitively, they're not getting the best game they could because they're playing for another team mate too...



If "Troll" queue comes up then **please** bring *REAL* Ranked Queues where there aren't any trollers, AFKers, DCers, players learning roles/champions for the first time, people who don't play competitive, etcs so we can have our competitive play style and climb better with real Ranked players...   or simply just give us our Solo Queue back already. It's not even hard... Simply just change and update the program back into the game mode/client...

Oh you can't? So why give props to someone who legitimately admitted he trolls in Ranked for fun and when getting flamed for doing so he can walk away because he believes he has every right to?...

> [{quoted}](name=NoRunesMasteries,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5oXZOYh8,comment-id=00050011,timestamp=2016-09-01T00:20:58.621+0000)

It's not even hard... Simply just change and update the program back into the game mode/client...

> Oh you can't? So why give props to someone who legitimately admitted he trolls in Ranked for fun and when getting flamed for doing so he can walk away because he believes he has every right to?...

I don't think upvoting means you agree with their gameplay or anything. Personally I don't go looking up everyone's match history before reading and responding to posts. The OP just brought up an interesting idea, and people are interested in discussing it. And honestly, for OP to be self-aware enough to admit that perhaps their style of playing League doesn't line up with others' and want to be able to separate the two is pretty awesome.

And in no way did anybody say this 'troll queue' is actually happening. In fact, the post you are responding to here [mine] gently prods the OP toward existing avenues of less-serious play.
it would be great if there was an option in custom games to disable minions spawning

Custom games are great for this, maybe make a group on Discord or something specifically for this for those "silly troll" games. I'd join it, I like customs just to mess around in ways you couldn't do matchmade (all random SR, Draft Pick Howing Abyss, those games you mentioned, etc.) a dedicated queue seems kinda silly, but I wouldn't mind that either.

(Imagine that though, a troll to a troll queue, where they act all serious on purpose to troll the trolls, sounds super weird.)

Just as a supporter of this post, it does feel better on weekends when rotating queues come out. Silliness is an inherent quality of games like Hexakill or Legend of the Poro King. However, even in games like URF or Ascension, you still find people obsessed with winning. I'll still get flamed if I don't go 3000/0/Infinity as Teemo, or oneshot a turret as Master Yi.

Custom games would be an excellent way to circumvent the (to be fair) small portion of the community that will never be satisfied without a complete victory. However, you need 10 like-minded people to start a silly game on Summoner's Rift, and ten people willing to play a throwaway game is difficult, even among friends, not to mention caps to the amount of friends you can have, and whether or not they're all on at one time! So a troll queue would not only be a gameplay judgement-free place, but also a place for people from other continents to connect and watch an attack speed Bard destroy in bottom lane. 

Therefore, I think a "troll queue" would consist of games without any reward- no experience, no IP, no chests, nothing- thus creating an incentive for serious players to play anything but the Troll games. This way, we awful and silly off-meta masters (MAGE JAX LIVES ON!) can be ridiculous without detracting from the fun of others.

Unfortunately "faker jrs" still exist in the rotating game modes. Urf is only fun when there aren't any urf meta picks and in all for one people are more concerned about winning than the possibly interesting interactions or they only like playing yas for the dumb ult chain. The other modes i don't play much.

> [{quoted}](name=loux8591,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5oXZOYh8,comment-id=0005000a,timestamp=2016-08-31T21:44:44.069+0000)
>
> Unfortunately "faker jrs" still exist in the rotating game modes. Urf is only fun when there aren't any urf meta picks and in all for one people are more concerned about winning than the possibly interesting interactions or they only like playing yas for the dumb ult chain. The other modes i don't play much.

So I decided to play all for one for once.

Two of us, including me, pick yorick, another two pick lee sin. You know, I find the idea of 20 ghosts and a 10v5 to be hilarious, so I wanted to try it out.

We end up with yorick. The rest of our team proceeds to intent feed and yell at the two of us for picking yorick. They tell the enemy team to report us. We end up having 0 fun whatsoever. As if 5 people playing lee sin would have been more fun and successful than 5 yoricks.

Riot should at the least create a section in the forums for Club Hosting, etcs where players can come together and join clubs if not maybe to come about to join in on game modes. Like the Recruitment section but that's more towards ranked and so forth.

I've tried to look for clubs to join but they're all dated to like 5 months ago and so on...

This could easily help those active forum members and curious gamers who are interested in seeing what the forums has to offer to find a place to chill, meet players and etcs.
that being said. i feel like there should be an actual statement from riot as to the competitive nature of ranked. and that it isnt the place for troll builds or "goofing off"

just do what GTA Online does and make a seperate queue system for trolls and people who don't care about winning and just like fucking around, problem solved.

You guys could learn a thing or two from Rockstar and Blizzard.

i honestly agree with this sentiment. the main reason league is so toxic is different players have different goals. but mmr is the only thing separating people. 

lets say you have 5 different players on the same team

player 1 is a fresh 30 in ranked

player 2 is a casual player who is playing ranked for faster queues. and doesnt actually care whether they win or lose

player 3 is a troll.  but doesnt troll to be mean. they just do it for shits and giggles and dont understand the effect it has on people

player 4 is a person playing ranked to climb

player 5 is a challenger smurf. but they arent actually playing seriously


obviously these players arent going to get along. so why should they be forced to?

Player 1: "Wtf is going on? Why is player 4 screaming? Is he talking to me? What is a smurf? I just bought my third {{item:3078}}, why I don't have 60% CDR?"

Player 2: "Ohh player 4 is raging at player 1, why do I even play this game?"

Player 3: *Picks {{champion:35}}* "CAN'T TOUCH THIS! Dun dun dundun!"

Player 4: "/all WTF ARE YOU BUILDING 3 TRIFORCES YOU FUCKING RETARDED APE? REPORT THIS FUCKING PIECE OF SHIT BOOSTED ANIMAL" -Side note: Somehow this player truly believes that player 1 has been boosted, even though they are in bronze 5.

Player 5: "Ok, I'm 0/20, now I'll sell all my items and carry as full AD {{champion:16}}"
i love you....
And I love you too, random citizien!

> player 2 is a casual player who is playing ranked for faster queues.

Player 2 has a really bad sense of time.
Faker Jr loooooool
This is a great idea. I mean, I suck at this game, but I love hanging out with funny people, so this sort of thing would make me love League even more: play, die a lot, and have fun.
Add me. We'll get along pretty well I think.
I tried, but it said your friends list was maxed out.
its called normals, they dont need to make another queue, normals is exactly what you described

Normals queues take a lot longer, don't have season rewards and people get just as pissed off there as they do in ranked.

The problem is that players have different goals when they queue up. We should be able to queue by goal more than just by MMR.

I should be put in a queue with people who don't take LoL seriously, won't remember if they won or lost the game the next day and just want to fuck around sandbox style.

Players like Faker Jr should be put with other people who take the game super seriously. Run lolrecorder 24/7 so they can analyze their old games and only play hard meta stuff.

> Players like Faker Jr should be put with other people who take the game super seriously. Run lolrecorder 24/7 so they can analyze their old games and only play hard meta stuff.

They already play that, it's called Ranked. They're at the right place, you're the one who needs map and makes fun of those who know where they are.

What 
I thought you were already talking about normals wtf

It's called bot games**

Or blind pick. Just to make that distinction. I don't think people care about blind, but leave draft alone.
I love how you claim being defensive yet it's all Ranked games and you literally did troll in them regardless your status of being 'drunk'... Stop ruining the game for that Faker Jr...

>Both of us are paying customers.

wut
It exists already, it's called "Normal Blind Pick".

problem is you do it ranked thats why people get so angry I troll build all the time(tank Jinx toplane is a particular favorite of mine) ...but i do it in norms and no one tends to care(also I still play to win with the "troll" builds)
Can you just ban this guy RIOT?  Nothing spells toxic player likes someone who plays a team game just to (*$# around with Teemo.

He literally in his Ranked games and admitted to "trolling" around being drunk... HE LITERALLY is RUINING the game for those players he insults as "Faker Jr" REALLY?... Have some decency at least and play normal games and if this happens THEN rant about it... 

Instead he rants about how Ranked games should be "troll" queues... This guy 10/10 and the community on the forums like him because he brings something everyone wants, "fun"
Just like Donald Trump. "Let's make Ranked queue Troll again"...
If you wan't to goof off and chill that's fine, but don't troll in RANKED.
Look up his games... Literally I would be okay and reasonable with him doing in normal but Ranked... for real this guy.
I think that's kinda why we have Normal and Ranked queues. That's the impression I get.

You're one of those idiots who goes into a rank game as support teemo with ghost and clarity giving first blood and spam in chat: "LOL BRO IM SO WASTEDDD XDDDD" 
Just fuck off play a custom game or play call of duty.

There already are plenty of modes like this.

Just stop ruining games and getting chat restrictions.  Repeating the same stuff everyone on the Internet repeats makes you a dork.

This ^

I 100% agree with your post. My boyfriend LOVES to fuck around on random champions, and I've seen him get raged at several times :( We need a mode for people who just want to have fun while playing videogames! Rito PLS!!!

The place for you (and me) are normal games. People that want to play the game with meta picks and pretend that they are LCS need to stay in ranked. Everyone likes winning and I get that. However, off meta picks can still be fun and win games and that is part of the fun of playing league.
